ComicInfo.Title: New Comic Safety; Sky; Close Call; Marvelous Movie Marathon
ComicInfo.Summary:
New Comic Safety: Don't read and drive.
Sky: The geeks are called out on their reading habits.
Close Call: Keith needs some toilet reading.
Marvelous Movie Marathon: The joys, the disagreements and the lows of a video marathon.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-11 15:12:57. [CVDB135628] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:31:11. [Issue ID 627981]
